get.description: Retrieve details of all subscriptions associated with a customer's plan ID.

parameters.name: plan-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the plan whose subscriptions are to be retrieved.

200.description: A JSON array of subscription objects.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token.

400.description: Not Found - No subscriptions found for the given plan ID.

get.description: Retrieve details of all subscriptions associated with a customer's plan ID or customer's email.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the customer Id whose subscriptions are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the email whose subscriptions are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (default is 0).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination (default is 10).

200.description: A JSON array of subscription objects.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token.

400.description: Not Found - No subscriptions found for the given plan ID.

get.description: Retrieve details of all subscriptions associated with a subscription ID.

parameters.name: subscription-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the subscription whose details are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (default is 0).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination (default is 10).

200.description: A JSON array of subscription objects.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token.

400.description: Not Found - No subscriptions found for the given plan ID.

post.description: Create a subscription plan under your integration.

internalReference.description: Internal reference code for the plan

amount.description: Amount to be charged per billing cycle

currency.description: Currency code for the plan (e.g. USD, NGN)

pricingList.description: Pricing options for the trial period

amount.description: Amount to be charged during the trial period

currency.description: Currency code for the trial period (e.g. USD, NGN)

parameters.name: skipErrors
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the plan whose subscriptions are to be retrieved.

file.description: Upload the file content and must in CSV format.

get.description: Retrieve details of a single subscription plan available on your integration.

parameters.name: plan-id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the plan whose details are to be retrieved.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid plan ID provided.

post.description: Create or update a subscription plan under your integration using the provided plan ID.

parameters.name: plan-id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the plan to create or update.

title.description: Name or title of the plan

internalReference.description: Internal reference code for the plan

amount.description: Amount to be charged per billing cycle

currency.description: Currency code for the plan (e.g. USD, NGN)

201.description: Subscription plan successfully created or updated.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid request body or parameters.

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient permissions to create or modify the plan.

get.description: This retrieves and lists all the wallets you've created. This is both for your main account and wallets.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (default is 0).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination (default is 10).

parameters.name: accountTag
parameters.description: This can either be sub-account, or main-account.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Choose the currency you want for your sub account. According, to our currently supported currencies, this is in NGN or GHS.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: This can either be test or live mode.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: This filters by the account number created for the sub accounts.

200.description: A JSON array of subaccounts objects.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token.

400.description: Not Found - No subscriptions found for the given plan ID.

post.description: Wallets are created only through the API and serve a unique purpose to act as a pocket of money where funds can sit in. Importantly, wallets do not require BVNs upon creation.

currency.description: According, to our currently supported currencies, this is in NGN and GHS.

accountName.description: Your desired name for your sub account.

200.description: A JSON array of subaccounts objects.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token.

400.description: Not Found - No subscriptions found for the given plan ID.

get.description: Retrieves paginated balances for main accounts with optional currency, mode, and date filters.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (default is 0).

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination (default is 10).

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Choose the currency you want for your sub account. According, to our currently supported currencies, this is in NGN or GHS.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: This can either be test or live mode.

200.description: A JSON array of balances objects.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token.

400.description: Not Found - No subscriptions found for the given plan ID.

get.description: Retrieves account balance details for all direct sub-accounts of the specified main account in both NGN and GHS.

200.description: A JSON array of balances objects.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token.

400.description: Not Found - No subscriptions found for the given plan ID.

get.description: Get account balance details for a specific sub-account before and after top-up in both NGN and GHS currency.

200.description: A JSON array of balances objects.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token.

400.description: Not Found - No subscriptions found for the given plan ID.

get.description: Get details of your created sub account by its ID. You can get this in either NGN or GHS.

200.description: A JSON array of account details objects.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token.

400.description: Not Found - No subscriptions found for the given plan ID.

id.description: The unique identifier for the subscription.

status.description: The current status of the subscription (e.g., active, canceled, past_due).

startDate.description: The date and time when the subscription started.

nextPaymentDate.description: The date and time when the subscription started.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the subscription was created.

customer.description: Details of the customer associated with the subscription.

name.description: The full name of the customer.

metadata.description: A set of key-value pairs that can be attached to the subscription for storing additional information.

regionName.description: The geographical region associated with the subscription.

amount.description: The amount to be charged for the subscription.

SubscriptionPlanDetailsResponse.description: Represents detailed information about a subscription plan including pricing, trial, and region availability.

id.description: Unique identifier of the subscription plan (UUID).

title.description: The title or name of the subscription plan.

frequency.description: Billing frequency for the subscription plan.

internalReference.description: Internal reference code or identifier for the plan.

amount.description: The cost amount for the subscription plan.

currency.description: The currency of the subscription plan (e.g., NGN, USD).

status.description: The current status of the subscription plan.

regions.description: List of regions where this plan is available.

subscribers.description: Total number of active subscribers under this plan.

subscriptions.description: Total number of subscriptions created for this plan.

createdAt.description: Date and time when the plan was created.

trial.description: Details about the trial period associated with this plan.

id.description: Unique identifier for the trial configuration.

planId.description: The plan ID this trial configuration is associated with.

periodInDays.description: Number of days for the trial period.

type.description: The pricing model for the trial period.

amount.description: The cost amount during the trial period.

currency.description: Currency used for the trial pricing.

pricingList.description: List of pricing configurations for the trial.

pricingOptions.description: Different pricing options available for the plan.

amount.description: The cost amount for this pricing option.

currency.description: The currency code for this pricing option (e.g., NGN, USD).
